title: Coffee market share
description: Design a donut chart to show the market share of various coffee brands in a region, color-coded with 'maroon' for Brand X, 'navy' for Brand Y, and 'olive' for Brand Z.
solution:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

#plotting the chart
colors = ['maroon', 'navy', 'olive']
plt.pie(df['market_share'], colors=colors, labels=df['brand'],
        autopct='%1.1f%%', startangle=90)

my_circle = plt.Circle((0, 0), 0.7, color='white')
p = plt.gcf()
p.gca().add_artist(my_circle)
plt.title('Market Share of Coffee Brands')
plt.show()
